content:
I'm excited to start my new Instagram account focused on vegan recipes and cooking experiments! Thanks for the tips on how to grow a new account from scratch. I'll definitely keep them in mind as I start creating content and engaging with my audience.

By the way, I've been thinking about using the hashtag #veganfood on my posts, but I'm not sure if it's too broad. Do you think I should use a more specific hashtag like #veganrecipes or #plantbasedcooking instead?
